alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 11:22PM CST until January 25 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Slippery travel due to snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches expected. Additional snowfall of up to one inch is possible Wednesday evening, especially near the lake. * WHERE...Lake IL, DuPage, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates of one half inch to locally one inch per hour are expected to occur during the morning commute. Visibility will be as low as one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; DuPage; Lake; Northern Cook
